member.name: F:Enemies.Zombie.health
member.summary: Represents the health of the zombie.

member.name: F:Enemies.Zombie.name
member.summary: Represents the name of the zombie.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Sets the value of health to 0 and the default value of name to "(No name)".

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified health value.
member.param: The health value for the zombie.

member.name: P:Enemies.Zombie.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the zombie.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.GetHealth
member.summary: Gets the health value of the zombie.
member.returns: The health value of the zombie.
